an3.78:1.1: Atha kho ayasma anando yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho ayasmantam anandam bhagava etadavoca:
an3.78:1.2: “sabbam nu kho, ananda, silabbatam jivitam brahmacariyam upatthanasaram saphalan”ti?
an3.78:2.1: “Yanhissa, bhante, silabbatam jivitam brahmacariyam upatthanasaram sevato akusala dhamma abhivaddhanti kusala dhamma parihayanti, evarupam silabbatam jivitam brahmacariyam upatthanasaram aphalam.
an3.78:2.2: Yanca khvassa, bhante, silabbatam jivitam brahmacariyam upatthanasaram sevato akusala dhamma parihayanti, kusala dhamma abhivaddhanti, evarupam silabbatam jivitam brahmacariyam upatthanasaram saphalan”ti.
an3.78:3.1: Atha kho ayasma anando “samanunno me sattha”ti, utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva pakkami.
an3.78:3.2: Atha kho bhagava acirapakkante ayasmante anande bhikkhu amantesi:
an3.78:3.4: na ca panassa sulabharupo samasamo pannaya”ti.
